answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer:
Our project is the gate-way and all-in-one platform for DeFi. We allow users to access DeFi and make on-chain transactions via natural language inputs. Users simply need to give a command, for e.g. "Swap 500 USDC to SOL" through our chat-bot like interface and our AI will automatically execute the transaction for them via the best possible execution path to optimise for gas costs & minimising slippage.
The current complexities of interacting on-chain including wallet creation, navigating to different dApps, verifying transactions and multi step executions has made DeFi inaccessible for most users, limiting adoption. Our platform makes DeFi 10X easier to use while abstracting away all complexities traditionally associated with the blockchain. We believe that this will significantly drive DeFi adoption and activity throughout the Ethereum ecosystem.
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: Our platform is building core infrastructure including our own proprietary LLMs and solver networks to ensure that user intent can be decoded and executed efficiently. Our LLMs have been trained on crypto specific data.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
1.	DeFi remains too complex for the Average user. For example, even a simple swap transaction can require multiple steps & approvals
Our solution drastically simplifies DeFi interactions and our AI automatically executes these transactions automatically, eliminating complexity. Users simply give us a single command through natural language inputs without worrying about the steps needed to achieve the desired outcome.

2.	Ever-growing number of L1s & L2s : Today’s DeFi spans multiple Layer-1 and Layer-2 networks. Each has its own bridging solutions, tokens, and user interfaces, This has led to fragmentation of the Ethereum ecosystem as navigating between various chains is tedious & challenging and time consuming.
Our solution enables multi-chain transactions with a single input. For example a users can say "Swap 500 USDC on Ethereum to 500 USDT on Arbitrum". The user does not need to worry about which bridge to use, which DEX's to use or even gas fees improving interoperability between chains. They simply see a single unified and consolidated dashboard and the AI handles cross-chain interactions behind the scenes.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer: Our current focus is on developing the relevant infrastructure required to build a solution of this scale. Funding will primarily be put towards development & engineering costs.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer:
Our project's technology and infrastructure will be open-sourced allowing other developers to access the Web 3 domain specific LLMs that we've built contributing to the decentralisation of the Ethereum network.
One of the key challenges users face when transaction on-chain is security and verifying that the contracts they are signing are genuine and not malicious. A single mis click or visiting the wrong frontend can lead to wallets being drained.
Our AI verifies the authenticity of contracts before execution, ensuring the transaction is safe to execute. This drastically improves the security of Ethereum
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: WYT Network
project.description:
WYT is all in one DeFAI (DeFi X AI) platform that drastically simplifies DeFi for the masses. Through our intent-based solution, users can execute general purpose DeFi tasks from basic swaps to more advanced investment strategies via natural language prompts through our platform. Our solution drastically simplifies the user journey by eliminating all on-chain complexities.

The platform will have the following features:

Feature #1: AI Powered Research Assistant

Research markets and receive data-driven insights and recommendations in the real-time. We empower you to make Smarter, more informed decisions based on on & off-chain data.

Feature #2: Gateway to DeFi

The only platform you’ll ever need to access everything DeFi. Seamlessly execute any DeFi transaction by simply sending us a message including swaps, staking, yield farming, automated portfolio management & much more

Feature #3: Smart Orders 

Smart orders bring advanced order types typically available on centralized exchanges on-chain, allowing users to trade like never before. Users can place orders including DCA, Indicator-based limit orders, scale out orders and trailing orders 


Feature #4: Abstraction on-chain complexities

DeFi right now is too complex, even for experienced users. We abstract away all complexities of on-chain interactions, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

WYT aims to be make Ethereum accessible & easy to use for the masses.

Further Information:

Information Deck: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EIo6fcmC-_YFVorGIZqqFIZgDTpXxHPt/view?usp=sharing

Demo Video: https://drive.google.com/file/d/17eP4wdfwj_GftihLCL_JRSDFgxs1UJHM/view
